tool_description: Optimizes service frequency for routes based on demand patterns, capacity constraints, and service level objectives while minimizing wait times.

route_demand.description: Hourly passenger demand for each route

vehicle_capacity.description: Passenger capacity for vehicles on each route

min_headway.description: Minimum time between vehicles in minutes (2-30)

max_headway.description: Maximum time between vehicles in minutes (10-120)

peak_multiplier.description: Frequency increase factor during peak hours (1.0-3.0)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: route_demand and vehicle_capacity must have same number of elements.
Invalid load factor: target_load_factor must be between 0.4-0.9.
Invalid headway range: min_headway (2-30 min) must be less than max_headway (10-120 min).
Invalid peak multiplier: peak_multiplier must be between 1.0-3.0.
Invalid time format: service hours must be in HH:MM format with start < end time.
Budget constraint violation: Requested service levels exceed budget_constraint.
usage: Provide route demand and vehicle capacity arrays. Configure frequency optimization parameters and constraints. Returns optimal headways and service levels.

optimal_headways.description: Optimal headway in minutes for each route during off-peak

peak_headways.description: Optimal headway in minutes for each route during peak periods

daily_trips.description: Total number of trips per day for each route

load_factors.description: Predicted load factor for each route

total_vehicle_hours.description: Total vehicle operating hours per day across all routes
